His calming presence is such a blessing. His ability to listen and assess what treatment is needed is such a gift. Lisa A Our Treatments Acupuncture Acupuncture has a long history of success in treating any type of pain. When performed by a well-trained practitioner like Dr. Matthew Mann, it has the ability to treat a broad array of conditions. Dry Needling Dry needling is a technique used to treat trigger points and myofascial pain. Dry needling can and often does result in a complete absence of symptoms, even with severe pain conditions that have been present for years. This treatment is quick and you will often be in and out of the office in 30 minutes. Herbal Medicine Chinese herbal medicine is a one of the oldest tools that humans have successfully used to treat health issues big and small when provided by a well-trained practitioner like Dr. Matthew Mann. Reasons You Will Love St Petersburg Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine Tailored Treatment Plans We treat each patient on a case-by-case basis and tailor treatment plans specifically for you to maximize results. A Better Approach to Your Wellness Our treatments tap into your body's own power to heal itself. This allows your body the ability to keep you healthier in the future. Our Founder Dr. Matthew Mann, DAOM, AP Dr. Matthew Mann is an expert in the field of acupuncture and Chinese herbal medicine, especially when it comes to chronic and seemingly hopeless cases. His focus is treating chronic pain, failed surgeries, and rheumatoid conditions. It brings me great joy to help my patients on their journeys to embrace life without the chronic health conditions that have prevented them from living their fullest life potential for so long.
